Content: Police say 2 women have been hacked to death at Warallamandiya in Kosgama in Avissawella this morning (Jun 02). The deceased were 34-year-old, mother of one child and her grandmother, who was a 78-year-old. The young mother's child was just one-month-old. Police said the murders have been committed over money. It is suspected that a relative of the victims had committed the murders and he has fled the area. The suspect was a money lender.
